 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִמּוֺן‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Jer.52.23|Jer 52:23]]</sup> ==pomegranate== (foreign word of doubtful origin, compare [[BDB#Löw|Löw]]<sup>No.310</sup> [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>A.u. A. 97 ff.</sup>; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רִימּוֺנָא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוּמָּנָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Mandean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רומאנא‎</span> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>M.123</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (Aramaic loan-word, [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>142</sup>), Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span> [[1Sam.14.2|1Sam 14:2]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִמֹּן‎</span> [[Exod.39.26|Exod 39:26]] (twice in verse); suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִמֹּנִי‎</span> [[Song.8.2|Song 8:2]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִמּוֺנִים‎</span> [[1Kgs.7.20|1Kgs 7:20]] +, etc.; — ***pomegranate:*** 

**1.** tree [[1Sam.14.2|1Sam 14:2]], often + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גְּפֶן‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּאֵנָה‎</span>, etc., [[Num.20.5|Num 20:5]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[Deut.8.8|Deut 8:8]]; [[Hag.2.19|Hag 2:19]]; [[Joel.1.12|Joel 1:12]]; [[Song.4.13|Song 4:13]]; [[Song.6.11|Song 6:11]]; [[Song.7.13|Song 7:13]]. 

**2.** fruit [[Num.13.23|Num 13:23]] ([[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲנָבִים‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּאֵנִים‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲסִיס ר‎</span> [[Song.8.2|Song 8:2]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּלַח הָר‎</span> (in simile) [[Song.4.3|Song 4:3]]; [[Song.6.7|Song 6:7]]. 

**3.** ornaments in temple, shaped like pomegranates (compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> in modern Syria = ***apaulet***, Almkvist<sup>Ki. Beiträge zur Lexicogr., etc.</sup> [[BDB#Nes|Nes]]<sup>Marg. 12</sup>), [[1Kgs.7.18|1Kgs 7:18]] (on text compare [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>ZAW iii (1883), 154 f.</sup> [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#Benz|Benz]]), v[[1Kgs.7.20|1Kgs 7:20]] v[[1Kgs.7.42|1Kgs 7:42]] v[[1Kgs.7.42|1Kgs 7:42]] \|\| [[2Chr.3.16|2Chr 3:16]]; [[2Chr.4.13|2Chr 4:13]] (twice in verse); [[2Kgs.25.17|2Kgs 25:17]] = [[Jer.52.22|Jer 52:22]]; [[Jer.52.22|Jer 52:22]]; [[Jer.52.23|Jer 52:23]] (twice in verse); so in tabernacle, [[Exod.28.33|Exod 28:33]]; [[Exod.28.34|Exod 28:34]] (twice in verse); [[Exod.39.24|Exod 39:24]]; [[Exod.39.25|Exod 39:25]] (twice in verse); [[Exod.39.26|Exod 39:26]] (twice in verse).
